name: Prismatic
description:
Made in the context of school.

Defeat enemies, gain new skills, clear all the rooms.

Keyboard and Mouse Controls:
Q - Pause
WASD - Move around
Mouse - Point
Left Click - Shoot
Right Click - Dodge
Hold Left Click - Charge Laser
E - Place Bomb
Space - Shoot Circle

Gamepad Controls:
Start - Pause
Left Stick - Move around
Right Stick - Point
Right Trigger - Shoot
Left Tigger - Dodge
Hold Right Trigger - Charge Laser
Left Toggle - Place Bomb
Right Toggle - Shoot Circle
